column4: 1) the sudo echo command won't work 2) you don't know if it's a dns problem
1) it very well could be 2) backup resolv.conf so it's fine 3) numbered lists are stupid :)
the sudo echo will not work - you need something like  echo "foo" | sudo tee /etc/resolve.conf ( see the RootSudo wiki page)
interesting how you managed to imply stupidity when you had just given inaccurate advice ;)
